CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 2, 1954, pg. 12, reads: "THE DECKS GIVE A PARTY - The popular young maids and matron club group, the Decks, gave their annual Christmas cocktail party at Loendi Club, Sunday evening, for some three hundred friends. Snapped during the gay evening by Photographer Teenie Harris are...Last photo: the glamorous club members, front row: President Lois Hall, Mary Shelton, Alma Fox, Ida Mae Mauney, Norma Malone, Vivian Mason and Marion Slater.  Second row: Elizabeth Hill, Vonda Burwell, Jessie Boyd, Mildred Bass, Betty Tibbs, Evelyn Anderson, Mildred Britton, Anna Mae English, Betty Williams, Ruth Mellix and Thelma Burgess.  Top row: Jane Lewis Williams, Kay Jones, Lorena Bowler and Thelma Dunning.  Only members missing: Edna Britton, Jean Slater and Mary Golf. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of twenty-two women of Decks Club, seated: president Lois Hall, Mary Shelton, Alma Speed Fox, Ida Mae Mauney, Norma Malone, Vivian Mason, and Marion Harris Slater; second row: Elizabeth Hill, Vonda Burwell, Jessie Boyd, Mildred Bass, Betty Tibbs, Evelyn Anderson, Mildred Britton, Anna Mae English, Betty Williams, Ruth Mellix, and Thelma Burgess; third row: Jane Lewis Williams, Kay Jones, Lorena Bowler, and Thelma Dunning, posed in front of Christmas tree in Loendi Club, another version
